ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So if you have a ploy, use it against Me now!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So if you have any plot to devise against Me, then devise it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So if you have any ploy, try it against Me!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: If you have any plans, use them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: If you now have any conspiracy, carry it out on Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, if you have a plot, use it against Me (Allah)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So if you have a plan, plan against Me (now).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: if you have a trick, try you now to trick Me!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: If now ye have any wit, outwit Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: If now you have any strategy, use it against Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: If now ye have any craft, try that craft upon Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: If you have any stratagems [left], try them out against Me!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Now, if ye have a trick (or plot), use it against Me!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So if you have a plot, use it against Me (Allah)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: If you are cunning, then try your cunning against Me!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So if you have a strategy, use it against Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So if you have a plan, then plan against Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:39] So if you have any stratagems, any ploy to ward off your chastisement, try your strategems against Me!’ — put them into effect!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (If now ye have any wit) if you have the power to do anything to Me, (outwit Me) then do it; it is also said that this means: if you have any scheme against Me, then execute it.
